page.title: 15Robert Winters. Part Three.
page.content:
Robert's brother Michael is a member of the 3rd. Gainsborough Scouts and on the day that we visited he was at a camp taking part in a cooking competition. There are few children of Robert's age in the village so he has to find ways to amuse himself. He has built a bicycle in his spare time and sometimes goes for rides with his mother. Robert is also a strong swimmer but the nearest pool is in Gainsborough. Robert enjoys reading and he uses the library van that visits the village every fortnight on a Friday. Every Sunday Robert and his brother go to Sunday School at the Methodist Chapel in Heapham.
{See next page.
